member.name: T:ScriptCoreLib.Shared.Data.DynamicDataReader
member.summary:
This class provides an easy way to use object.property syntax with a DataReader by wrapping a DataReader into a dynamic object.
The class also automatically fixes up DbNull values (null into .NET and DbNUll)

member.name: F:ScriptCoreLib.Shared.Data.DynamicDataReader.DataReader
member.summary: Cached Instance of DataReader passed in

member.name: M:ScriptCoreLib.Shared.Data.DynamicDataReader.TryGetMember(System.Dynamic.GetMemberBinder,System.Object@)
member.summary: Returns a value from the current DataReader record If the field doesn't exist null is returned. DbNull values are turned into .NET nulls.
